document.title: COLLEGE AND CAREER READY STANDARDS Indiana Academic Standards World Languages East Asian Languages 2019

51FE963FC9B24DCAB22DD3FB446500CA.description: I can self-assess at the end of a term on the progress I have made and what I have learned.

90CDC31745BF45C8B22C8C0027EAFCC4.description: I can make decisions about topics that will be studied for the course.

3D2B53DE89E94FCCA30D2D1A235F2978.description:
Lifelong Learning - Learners set goals and reflect on their progress in using
languages for enjoyment, enrichment, and advancement.

E3B092D432A5427884B56B3C6F5EA942.description: I can respond appropriately if others praise me in the target language.

6F0B36F8520E405299EABDA63462A7A6.description: I can form and sustain relationships with others in the target language in a social community

3304A48A31F64336860EE7D67B880813.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Intermediate - I can use the target language both within and beyond the
classroom to interact and collaborate in my community and in the globalized world.

2FC3410AEFDE4EE68A69B03B6AA598B7.description:
School and Global - Learners use the language both within and beyond the
classroom to interact and collaborate in their community and the globalized world.

868A3F12F8CE4935AF79192BDA857ACF.description:
Communicate and interact with cultural competence in order to participate in
multilingual communities at home and around the world.

74FFF5DE0C9C49E48424460E62EBF7B2.description:
I can explain the differences in sentences between the target and native
languages, specifically, how sentences are organized.

D772648F4C5444B2B4D037FAD12DF199.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Intermediate - I can explain and provide generic details about differences and
similarities between my own language and the target language.

21056A45EB244993B4D67AA7632FBA15.description:
Language Comparisons - Learners use the language to investigate, explain, and
reflect on the nature of the language through comparisons of the cultures studied with their own.

477ABF5D1F9F4718967EB3B605AC99B8.description:
I can explain the similarities and differences in the public and private school
systems in my community and the target culture.

B15F7152410F451FA362C66CE8BCB176.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Intermediate - I can explain and provide generic details about differences and
similarities between my community and cultures of the target language.

A4044DE1FFDF4CC58D0A5A4256D74C8F.description:
Cultural Comparisons - Learners use the language to investigate, explain, and
reflect on the concept of culture through comparisons of the cultures studied with their own.

4AEADFB826AA48CD82583D9EDEF19E9F.description:
Develop insight into the nature of language and culture in order to interact with
cultural competence.

6D9A5D9FEB7E4F6FA99871355BF99A10.description:
I can expand my geographical knowledge of the target culture by studying
transportation systems or climate.

6C8E04C0E68241A9827793C92393AA9E.description:
I can expand my skills in home economics by following recipes in the target
language.

510A18B909D440FAA1C376F6A59E6A04.description:
I can expand my skills in business by filling out applications or creating resumes
in the target language.

8B142327D7474702B87647725E6F1751.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Intermediate - I can expand my knowledge of other disciplines while using the
target language and/or to solve problems creatively.

94A0BE669C7F483A9F9FEB7B0508CF43.description:
Making Connections - Learners build, reinforce, and expand their knowledge of
other disciplines while using the language to develop critical thinking and to solve problems creatively.

C528DC4E8933490497AACE31C49712FD.description:
I can comprehend and evaluate views on topics such as healthy lifestyles, cuisine,
rites of life (weddings, funerals, etc), school rules and enrollment, etc.

93BFD1F87A464C578CF0429F9C613B48.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Intermediate - I can access and evaluate more complex information and
perspectives that are available through the target languages and its cultures.

AF01E12568714DC7B26D10DE6B8DE7AA.description:
Acquiring Information and Diverse Perspectives - Learners access and
evaluate information and diverse perspectives that are available through language and its cultures.

EF85FF0C8B7441C18B58B83D00B7E31F.description:
Connect with other disciplines and acquire information and diverse perspectives in
order to use the language to function in academic and career-related situations.

CA0173778D9E4B968C29EF967574D4A9.description:
In my own and other cultures I can compare practices related to everyday life and
personal interests or studies.

54A89BEC598A408DAF3C8E6005CEFFAD.description:
In my own and other cultures I can compare products related to everyday life and
personal interests or studies.

CA89171B0FAF4E3993226CD475DA3163.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Intermediate - In my own words and other cultures, I can make comparisons
between products and practices to help me understand perspectives.

4BF886BABE224254B633859029F8B611.description:
Relating Cultural Practices and Products to Perspectives (Investigate)-
Learners use language to investigate, explain, and reflect on the relationship between the practices and
products to perspectives of the target cultures.

19CE43CF95B342B5A4EB39998EA1A661.description:
I can recognize that significant differences in behaviors exist among cultures, use appropriate
learned behaviors and avoid major social missteps.

F5C34BCACEDF4469A23CCBFEAA552B7D.description: I can explain the basic features of thinking patterns of the target language.

26022C00E0E0432CA57636C9CFE79077.description:
I can converse with peers from the target culture in familiar situations at school, work, or
play, and show interest in basic cultural similarities and differences.

0CEC557BF927432698536F75872C58BB.description: Proficiency Benchmark: Intermediate - I can interact at a functional level in familiar contexts.

E49C330854654F02AB62AA797D00034A.description:
Relating to Other Cultures by Interacting - Learners use language to interact
with others in and from another culture.

D40048D2F82E4C47A782A9A433595CCD.description: Interact with cultural competence and understanding.

363883BA4A694C868A83A467D71FDF38.description:
I can give detailed presentations on a variety of familiar topics and some concrete
topics I have researched, using a few short paragraphs, often across various time frames.

81BD483548CB4F6AA3D89591790EED08.description:
I can state my viewpoint on familiar or researched topics and provide reasons to
support it, using a few short paragraphs, often across various time frames.

1626CD07B1194CA4BF5AD89515C21F48.description:
I can tell stories about school and community events and personal experiences,
using a few short, paragraphs, often across various timeframes.

8DED3487D93840849E9AF19F021FEDD9.description:
I can give straightforward presentations on a variety of familiar topics and some
concrete topics I have researched, using sentences and series of connected sentences.

5E4818D7D7FC47D08D7B78026771315F.description:
I can state my viewpoint about familiar topics and give some reasons to support it,
using sentences and series of connected sentences.

6B2314D5C93942F3AC7277CC6A3A6855.description:
I can tell a story about my life, activities, events and other social experiences, using
sentences and series of connected sentences.

9EC2B7997F8240CDB13A05ADAF23B9B4.description: I can present on familiar and everyday topics, using simple sentences.

1CDC2C57C34747E9B340F59854F602F1.description:
I can express my preferences on familiar and everyday topics of interest and
explain why I feel that way, using simple sentences.

A504553790244AD18FA91DF80C4A3C67.description:
I can present personal information about my life, activities and events, using simple
sentences.

DBBCCA15F8E542D0B4B57A2022DEBFA2.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Intermediate - I can communicate information, make presentations, and express
my thoughts about familiar topics using sentences and series of connected sentences through spoken,
written, or signed language.

275B711D58A344498E4ED9C0FCAB767B.description:
Presentational: Learners present information, concepts, and ideas to inform,
explain, persuade, and narrate on a variety of topics using appropriate media and adapting to various
audiences of listeners, readers, or viewers.

F3E82CB72B8D40D0B4B0BE19A444D3B8.description: I can usually understand the main idea and flow of events expressed in various time frames in conversations and discussions.

3CD91B3D40C34CC1ABB9ED09377875D5.description:
I can usually follow the main story and actions expressed in various time frames in
paragraph-length fictional texts.

BC7855A00AF7404C9A7068E87536BA3B.description:
I can usually follow the main message in various time frames in straightforward, and
sometimes descriptive, paragraph length informational texts.

1E66C44B6AC846E89FCA08507CC5B46A.description: I can identify the main idea and key information in short straightforward conversations.

D8BC7AECA21C452F9F36AD21BD76A0A8.description: I can understand the main idea and key information in short straightforward fictional texts.

9BC6ABFDAACC42FF8A42B85AF68CAD68.description:
I can understand the main idea and key information in short straightforward informational
texts.

485D905919394174AFD31BDC5657CE6B.description: I can identify the main idea in short conversations.

BB795D606C714173A4C9B2A3CCAEEFF9.description: I can identify the topic and related information from simple sentences in short fictional texts.

EF655618018041349CE081D8937B9FC4.description:
I can identify the topic and related information from simple sentences in short informational
texts.

54EAFFB0214B4AD9B18AAD58E95E0FBF.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Intermediate - I can understand the main idea and some pieces of information
on familiar topics from sentences and series of connected sentences with texts that are spoken,
written, or signed.

5B514A63F20045DF9E8B57329697E905.description:
Interpretive: Learners understand, interpret, and analyze what is heard, read, or
viewed on a variety of topics.

8071552CD2AB401B8649F2B1C1A64298.description:
I can explain preferences, opinions, and emotions and provide advice on a variety of
familiar and some concrete topics that I have researched, using connected sentences that may
combine to form paragraphs and asking a variety of questions, often across various time frames.

C5E58CF6FCB04F6FAD9DDC36509C27A4.description:
I can interact with others to meet my needs in a variety of situations, sometimes involving
a complication, using connected sentences that may combine to form paragraphs and asking a variety
of questions, often across various time frames.

8DF7FB45C6584506A84B38D9B5BBB03E.description:
I can exchange information in conversations and some discussions on a variety of
familiar and some concrete topics that I have researched, using connected sentences that may
combine to form paragraphs and asking a variety of questions, often across various time frames.

30D70420471944CCAC045D3A5ED53009.description:
I can exchange preferences, feelings, or opinions and provide basic advice on a variety
of familiar topics, creating sentences and series of sentences and asking a variety of follow-up
questions.

942EC6E3A7FD4AA28A95B59CEDEA802A.description:
I can interact with others to meet my needs in a variety of familiar situations, creating
sentences and series of sentences and asking a variety of follow up questions.

14206AC47AD7424A96546D7EECE83D74.description:
I can exchange information in conversations on familiar topics and some researched
topics, creating sentences and series of sentences and asking a variety of follow-up questions.

8D2D486225C44DE8BBD34978753C2015.description:
I can express, ask about, and react with some details to preferences, feelings, or opinions
on familiar topics, by creating simple sentences and asking appropriate follow-up questions.

FA71C5DC39834D3384F45A1351CC688A.description:
I can interact with others to meet my basic needs in familiar situations by creating simple
sentences and asking appropriate follow-up questions.

25061A00D85047CE9B2315DBC942E6E8.description:
I can request and provide information in conversations on familiar topics by creating
simple sentences and asking appropriate follow-up questions.

BADC501EE57C4F1FA8AA7344A011B039.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Intermediate - I can participate in spontaneous spoken, written, or signed conversations on familiar topics, creating sentences and series of sentences to ask and answer a variety of
questions.

D5B6CBA7D07049CCB58D5DB2FCC4A66D.description:
Interpersonal: Learners interact and negotiate meaning in spoken, signed, or
written conversations to share information, reactions, feelings, and opinions.

B5FC62DB72B44DDCB79A245D1E0216A7.description:
Communicate effectively in more than one language in order to function in a
variety of situations and for multiple purposes.
